aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-6458-433 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Compressor stall during acceleration. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 05/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 08/08/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 07/08/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 12/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 11/08/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
